subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Another Sony Walkman
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Awesome Frank. You have been running across some good deals lately on parts for your stuff.

Misty


--- On Wed, 7/30/08, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

> From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Another Sony Walkman
> To: "Group" <evp-itc@yahoogroups.com>
> Date: Wednesday, July 30, 2008, 2:38 PM
> I found another older Sony Walkman--sports version at the
> thrift store toay for $.99. The RCA version works way beyond
> expectations so far, I'm making another wood box for it.
>

>  Frank-S
